reviews.review:
devs dont really give AF about you (326.7 hrs at review time)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
My initial review stance has not changed in fact the devs are now implementing NFT scams instead of fixing their fucking game. We get more new cosmetics/survivors/killers than actual patches to fix bugs. If you like getting fucked by the devs over and over this game is for you.

Game is spooky for the first 20 hours or so, after that its just cat and mouse, fun i suppose.
It is riddled a shit ton of bugs, balance issues, constant crashing, retarded devs, and dlc(which is riddled with bugs and they're asking for more money when the game isnt even fixed yet. Game is considered a full release when it is nowhere near that. Now things are just getting worse every fucking month, because of these incompetant cuck devs, suddenly crashing after every game or if I decide to cancel a lobbby. Unbelievable, you sell this as a full game when its ridden with tons of bugs and you have the audacity to release paid dlc. Wait till F13 comes out, assuming its good, youre fucking done behavior....

Love this game so much. I just wish the match making with friends wasn't so crappy. If you want to queue alone with randys you are good. You want your friend Joe and Melissa to play with you, matching you three with two more people is a living nightmare. I guess you can just chalk it up to making you live the horror in mulitple levels. Annoying to death/scaring you to death. It has an enjoyable gameplay inspite of the fact I die almost every match. hahahahaha!

dead by buglight<3

Dead by Daylight is a very tactical game that great to play with friends or solo. It makes you take decision that would make for a wining end or a horrible dead. The question you should ask your self ones you start is " Are you willing to risk your self for the sake of another surviver?"        -You will feel the pain of every decision you make...

The Dev decided that the survivors should not win anymore.  There is also no reason to play anything else than the HAG since you cannot save someone from the basement.  She can camp without even staying near her target since she can teleport. So no more saving peeps from hook guys, cause she can pop out in your face and hit the target again 9 out of 10 times.  Is the game even tested by the devs? Are they even playing their own game from time to time? I don't understand why they wanted to kill their own game, but if so ... they are doing a splendid job at that.  I'm out ...

My last review :
This game is great, chase the puny survivors and sacrifice them to the terrible Entity or strive to open the door by repairing generator to get out of the killer's grasp ... and maybe if you there help your fellow survivor to do the same.

This is one the most addicting game I've played so far.  You can either connect from time to time or stay up all night playing yith friends or even kill them. 

The game really grow into itself and is now one of my favorite games.
Shit, still play it, 10/10

Dead by Daylight has a very unique game concept that many people find is a good mix up from the many shooters and RPGs that are currently dominating the game industry.  The teamwork aspect of the game really challenges surviviors in a positive way and tests killers on their own capabilities.  Some of the game progression could be tweaked (which it currently is) but overall this game is extremely fun and addicting and I highly recommend it.

(Error code 1)

The attempt of a boycott is currently underway for Dead by Daylight. For the next 3 months we are going to cease all sales, and stop buying everything BHVR releases. This includes cosmetics, rifts, and the next Chapter. BHVR has treated the health of the game poorly and ignored the community for the past 2 years, with it only getting worse and worse. If you are reading this and want DBD, wait for the next 3 months before you get it, and check in to see if anything has changed.
meh

This is an amazing/addicting game. The devs care about this game a lot more than other companies do and they really do listen to the community. I'd recommend this game to anyone looking for a new game to replace an old one.

[strike] Do you like playing with people from russia in your canadian servers? do you like playing against an impossible to kill Survivor? How about an impossible to evade killer? If you said YES to one of these questions, this game is for you. [/strike]

 [h1] TL;DR: Game is fun to play, terrible devs, Would wait for sale. [/h1]

I made that review months and months ago, And you would think with time the devs would fix issues that are gamebreaking. Yet every match i play somebody has left, the killer is camping me and the Nea (playable character) is pointing at me and then farming me for points, while the other player is so laggy he cant move.

I'm not saying I would do any better to code and fix these bugs and mishaps, however I am a player that wants to enjoy this game. Developers, I want to enjoy this game but you continue to make things worse or change nothing at all. Your latest update indroducing the [b] Emblem System [/b] didnt help balancing the game for anyone. Now killers that never deserved their rank are flying high at [i] rank 1 [/i] [spoiler] (Even though Rank 1 is completely void of any players because the matchmaking system is garbage) [/spoiler] while survivors who may or may not deserve it are forced to stay at rank 15 because no matter what they do they cant rank up. In a stream you once told us we could play the way we wanted too. Now you have completely mucked up that statement by creating a system that doesn't work. I dont mind having a couple odd games where i lose, its going to happen. But when i finish all 5 gens and I never let the killer see me, I am punished for that, while the killer is rewarded for focusing down one player. Camping is always going to happen, I realize some players might just want that kill, but when you are punishing players for something they cant control (such as camping) you are making it less fun for the rest of us to enjoy. I sincerely hope you get control of yourselves and fix these issues.

Disclaimer: I main killer; however, I'll play this game as survivor when with friends, so if anything, I'd be biased towards (in favour of) killers. 

Edit: If you like killing people, go for it. If you plan on playing survivor, find a different game. 

I have been through a lot of shit in this game, I bought it on launch day and have seen a lot of changes. This is probably the worst state I've seen this game in. Also, previous Rank 1 Killer and Rank 1 Survivor, but I stopped playing for about 4 months, and I have come back to a hell hole. 

My review in November, 2016 "Most fun I've had in a long time! :D"

My Review now: 

This game is honestly trash in its current state. Since launch, this game has been so easy for survivors, they have had no problem winning the game so as long as they didn't get a good killer... It has seen many changes with the goal of nerfing the survivors so that the killer may have an easier time winning matches; however, this latest patch takes it too far. 

For first time buyers:

Right now, the game is in no state to be purchased, the majority of the respectful community have since left this game behind. Games are filled with Killers from China, which causes major lag, because the game is P2P. These Chinese killers also have no Game Etiquette, and will face camp/tunnel you hard. 
Survivors are also huge problems, its as if the game currently has a lot of Summer Sale Noobs, and survivors will take you off the hook when the killer is standing right in front of you, resulting in the killer grabbing you and hooking you again. As I see it, this game is only a slope downhill, and will not see any proper improvment from the community or the devs.

For people who understand the game: 

In this games current state, the killers are insanley overpowered, even with a 4 man SWF. There are about 6 pallets on the map and you have nowhere to run, a lot of killer ITEM ADD-ONS have overpowered abilities with no proper drawback (The Huntress can 1 hit down you with her hatchets, only penalty is a removal of 2 hatchets) (The Shape still has Fragrant Tuft of Hair, Judith's Tombstone, and Tombstone Piece, which by the way are fairly common items to get on the bloodweb.)
Most survivor perks have been nerfed, and you will see a lot of killers camping because its easy to do now, the past 12 matches I have played, I have had 11/12 games someone has disconnected at the start of the match, and roughly 9 campers. 



No, DO NOT BUY THIS!

Well this game is something I like to play and waste some time in but in the current state there is a large number of issues but still some very good positive ones.

Pros:
+Fun gameplay loop
+Pretty good animations when they work right
+Good progression as well as a overall coming soon to add even more
+Plenty of killers and survivors to play

Cons:
-Glitchy at points such as having killers get stuck in pallets or shot out of the map
-Community can be quite toxic and rude for no real reason
-Plenty of serious bugs still exist and haven't been fixed yet

Personally I enjoy the game. If you don't like grindy gameplay that is basically the same with very slight variations you probably won't enjoy the game.

Dead by Daylight is quickly becoming my favorite game of 2016.... it actually plays like two seperate but connected games. Survivor and Killers have completely differant play styles, and many options to choose from on both sides. Innitially when I started playing, it was fairly buggy and had quite a few issues connecting on multiplayer. I gave DBD a rest for a few months and came back to check it out just before the October patch (which added the first DLC content).

I don't know the long term plans this company has to support the game in the distant future but the difference a few months have made are fantastic. Many more maps to play on, enough survivor and killer variety to keep me coming back for many matches a week, and an evolving meta game that has had me reading up on patch notes and strategies that I haven't really done in past games.

Two thumbs up for this game, and thanks to the developers for keeping in touch with the community!
